thread.title: Ms Patrycja Krol
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Ms Patrycja Krol

author: Ms Patrycja Krol
title: Ms Patrycja Krol
text: I have ordered converse , the delivery was going to take next working day if you order before 7 o'clock but it has came 2 days after, also i have ordered size 5 and when the shoes arrived they were to big and they have fit a size 6 and a half very disappointed
